sabina.route

Class SimpleRouteMatcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • sabina.route.SimpleRouteMatcher
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RouteMatcher

    final class SimpleRouteMatcher
extends java.lang.Object
implements RouteMatcher
    Simple route matcher that is supposed to work exactly as Sinatra's

        public <T extends java.lang.Exception> void processFault(Fault<T> handler)
